meanings.definition: The quality or state of being superb.
meanings.sent1: Her superbnesses in painting always amazed us.
meanings.sent2: The superbnesses of the sunset took our breath away.
meanings.sent3: The superbnesses of his dance moves made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The superbnesses of her voice was like a melody to our ears.
meanings.sent5: The superbnesses of the mountain view was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: The superb quality or state of something.
meanings.sent1: The superbnesses of the cake made it irresistible.
meanings.sent2: We were all impressed by the superbnesses of the performance.
meanings.sent3: The superbnesses of the joke had us all laughing.
meanings.sent4: The superbnesses of the diamond sparkled in the light.
meanings.sent5: The superbnesses of the garden was a sight to behold.
